author: Patrick Buchanan
title: Will COVID-19 Retire the World’s Policeman?
description: This pandemic may prove the decisive factor in America's retreat from global hegemony. The post Will COVID-19 Retire the World’s Policeman? appeared first on The American Conservative.
content:
This pandemic may prove the decisive factor in America's retreat from global hegemony.For declaring in March that the U.S. economy might be reopened by Easter, President Donald Trump was roundly mocked.
Yet, it appears his political instincts were correct. H… [+4795 chars]
